name: Super-Position Bros
description:
Two worlds are 'joined together' to make path!

You can control character of each world (red and blue) and take superposition of worlds so that characters coincide with each other.

Joined character (yellow) can step on any platform. 

The key is that joined world will look very different depending on the position of characters when joining!

< controls >

  • move LR: arrow keys
  • jump: space
  • switch control between worlds: control
  • join/unjoin worlds: shift
  • restart: R
